
### `r contrast` results {.tabset}

#### MA plots

```{r , echo=FALSE,out.width = "50%"}
diff.plots <- DiffAnal.plot(FlomicsMultiAssay@ExperimentList[[paste0(data,".filtred")]], 
                            hypothesis=contrast,
                            Adj.pvalue.cutoff = FlomicsMultiAssay@ExperimentList[[paste0(data,".filtred")]]@metadata[["DiffExpAnal"]]$Adj.pvalue.cutoff)

diff.plots$MA.plot
```

#### Pvalue plots

```{r , echo=FALSE,out.width = "50%"}
diff.plots$Pvalue.hist
```
